lines: Nkubotu ku syoma Jesu, Ku kondwa ijwi lyakwe;
Kusyoma cisyomyo cakwe, Ku lomya majwi akwe.
Jesu, Jesu, nda mu syoma, Nda ka mu sola kanji;
Jesu, Jesu, Jesu wangu, Ndi pa luse ku syoma.
Nkubotu ku syoma Jesu, A ku syoma bulowa;
Nda yanda kusalazigwa bulowa bu futusya.
Nkubotu ku syoma Jesu, A ku leka ku bisya;
Ku tambula kufutuka, A kuumuna kwakwe.
Nda komana ku ku syoma, Jesu wangu mubotu;
Ndi lizyi uli ambebo, U li ambe bo lyoonse.
